modName: Dagger damage fix - fortify spells and one handed perks will work
summary:
This simple mod fixes the dagger damage bug being not influenced by some one handed perks and one handed fortify spelled equipment. 

It worked properly for me but it may cause problems with any other mod
that impacts onehanded weapons.
descriptionHtml:
This simple mod fixes the dagger damage bug being not influenced by some one handed perks and one handed fortify spelled equipment. 

Dragon bone dagger is not included yet. 
I\'m sorry but i have to wait for the ck update. :(

It worked properly for me but it may cause problems with any other mod
that impacts onehanded weapons. 
If some dagger won\'t act properly, tell me pls. :)

German translation added. 
If i missed a dagger or messed up some spelling, pls tell me. ^^
author: speedbraker91
